author: Amazon Customer "RT"

review: I am an Amazon fan and am loyal to Amazon even with it's warts.  In this case I am a bit disappointed with content and features.  For example I can't cast or mirror my Kindle Fire because it's an older version, that stinks, Amazon should make that available.  I also cannot get a simple internet browser app to work/load on Fire TV nor can I side-load an app even when following all the instructions for developers.  So my main goal was to mirror or cast my cable provider live TV broadcast wirelessly  from my Kindle Fire to the Fire TV and it's a no go so far.  Maybe there is a solution out there, I'll keep looking.  I will probably get a Chromecast stick which has a Browser and see it that works.
